text: @realDonaldTrump STOP TALKING ABOUT ELECTIONS AND START FOCUSING ON THE AMERICANS DYING FROM THE VIRUS! I’M A COVID-19 CRISIS NURSE AND YOUR AMERICAN MEDICAL COMMUNITY NEEDS HELP TO FIGHT WHAT’S RAPIDLY KILLING THE AMERICAN PEOPLE. WE HAVE BEGGED FOR YOUR HELP FROM THE START AND WESTILLNEEDHELP!
